The user also appears to have a fondness for classic films, as several of their favorites are from the Golden Age of Hollywood.

In terms of plot, the user seems to enjoy stories that are both complex and entertaining, with a mix of humor, romance, and drama. Many of their favorite movies feature well-developed characters and unexpected twists, suggesting a preference for plots that are both engaging and thought-provoking.
